name: Fromage Hunter
description:
Yé où mon fromage?

How do I select a labyrinth?

The available labyrinths which I provide are:

[ GROSLABY , LABY10, LABYVIDE, NOCHEESE, XTRALABY ]

Simply type the name of one of these labyrinths to load it.

it is entirely possible to add your own labyrinths. Add your own .txt files which follow a specific format which goes as follows: 

x y size

number of walls

x1 y1 x2 y2  position on grid of start and finish of wall (repeat for number of walls)

x y position of cheese

x y position of mouse
